CustomField.formula: TEXT( Opportunity__r.Line_of_Business__c ) == 'FVA' && (TEXT( Opportunity__r.Job_Type__c ) == 'Board Advisory Services (BAS)' || TEXT( Opportunity__r.Job_Type__c ) == 'FMV Transaction Based Opinion' || TEXT( Opportunity__r.Job_Type__c ) == 'Fairness' || TEXT( Opportunity__r.Job_Type__c ) == 'Solvency' || Opportunity__r.Job_Code__c == '5521') && (TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney to Adverse Party Board/Special Committee' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney to Adverse Party Company' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney to Board/Special Committee' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney (Acquirer)' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney (Target)' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney Advising other Transaction Party' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Banker Advising Acquirer' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Banker Advising Target' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Banker Advising other Transaction Party' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Attorney to Houlihan Lokey' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Board of Directors' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Board of Directors - non-management' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Adverse Party' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'CFO of Company' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'CEO of Company' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Company Management' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Financial Advisor to Company/Debtor' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Financial Advisor to Potential Buyer' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Majority Owner' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Management Contact' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Member of Board of Directors' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Independent Director' || TEXT( Role__c ) == 'Other')
CustomField.label: Conversion Check
